user.title: Connect to MinderGas
user.description: Enter your MinderGas API key. You can obtain it from the [MinderGas API page](https://mindergas.nl/member/api).

meter_config.title: Meter Reading Configuration
meter_config.description: Configure automatic meter reading uploads to MinderGas. For reliable operation, uploads should occur between **00:05** and **01:00** to spread server load and avoid errors. You can either specify a fixed time or enable random scheduling.

data.randomize_post_time: Use random time within upload window

data_description.post_meter_reading: Enable automatic daily meter reading uploads
data_description.post_time: Time of day to post the meter reading (must be between 00:05 and 01:00)
data_description.post_meter_entity_id: Select the sensor entity that contains your current meter reading
data_description.randomize_post_time: If enabled, a random time between 00:05 and 01:00 will be chosen each day

stats_config.title: Statistics Update Configuration
stats_config.description: Configure automatic updates of usage statistics and forecasts from MinderGas.

data_description.update_stats: Enable automatic updates of yearly usage, forecasts, and degree day statistics
data_description.update_time: Time of day to fetch the latest statistics (should be after meter reading time)
